snippet: New books by Guy Delisle, Jean-Pierre Filiu, Catel, Roger Langridge and Brandon Graham.
abstract: Douglas Wolk reviews graphic novels Jerusalem: Chronicles From the Holy City by Guy Delisle, Best of Enemies: A History of US and Middle East Relations, Part One: 1783-1953 by Jean-Pierre Filiu and David B, Kiki De Montparnasse by Catel Muller and Jose-Louis Bocquet, Snarked! Volume 1: Forks and Hope by Roger Langridge and King City by Brandon Graham.
lead_paragraph: New books by Guy Delisle, Jean-Pierre Filiu, Catel, Roger Langridge and Brandon Graham.
